The files inside this folder here are third party and not written myself. All of them are originally from the VR tutorial "Create with VR" from the official Unity website.

Link: https://learn.unity.com/course/create-with-vr
Download of the whole course package: https://connect-prd-cdn.unity.com/20210402/8a67971c-e957-4844-9964-8445a85103e8/Create-with-VR_2020LTS.zip

They are just supporting some handy basic mechanism of the XR Rig and do not have anything in comming with the logic of the project.
